definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Accumulating heat by water in electric heating boiler is one of the load regulating methods.
sentences.chinese: 電鍋爐水儲熱技術是負荷側調峯技術的一種。

sentences.english: Old granny was used to cook it in the rice cooker.
sentences.chinese: 老祖母慣常用電鍋蒸茄子。

sentences.english: Household electric boiler is the first choice for home heating.
sentences.chinese: 家用電鍋爐是家庭獨立採暖的首選。

sentences.english: Electric boiler heat-storage technology with water is an effective means of regulating peak load.
sentences.chinese: 電鍋爐水儲熱技術是一種負荷側調峯技術。

sentences.english: A new type of automatic control system for the intelligent electric boiler is developed.
sentences.chinese: 研製了一種新型的智能電鍋爐全自動控制系統。

sentences.english: An electric pot? Could you please step over to the counter on the right and open the box for inspection?
sentences.chinese: 電鍋？麻煩請到右邊的櫃檯並打開讓工作人員檢查。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
